item.title: About Me!
item.description: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success . . . Such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything. (Nikola Tesla) Who I am? #Hello! My name is Matheus Bitencourt and I’m a software developer. Besides programming, I also like create projects using my 3D printer and eletronics.
